result.eng: The Polish are the most numerous immigant group to Ireland. This is so because of the high population of Poland.

result.eng: They moved to France because they were very well aware how dangerous things were for Polish Jews.

result.eng: Because of these developments, the citizen now had a toolbox that gave him the chance to function as a journalist, globally and at little cost.
